nodes.title: Added Extension Points For CommonMark Library
Add a Toolbar to the ImagePreviewActivity
Fix Crash on Decimal Score Using Comma
Set End Date With Auto Increment Widget
Add StartedAt and CompletedAt options in Edit Entry
Added Option To Change Application Language
Update platform version to match build.gradle
Fix a crash caused by the 'Actor Roles' fragment, and enable the page in the Characters activity
Created our first terms of services / privacy policy
Optimized the code by converting to kotlin
Fix enabling NSFW content showing only NSFW content and excluding SFW content
Fix dismissing notifications issue & Product flavours fixes
Add option to enable nsfw content in the github flavour
Add a delete dialog to avoid users accidental ly deleting activity posts
Fix missing list view style setting in the github flavour
Fix opening a user's feed through a mention containing the global feed
Fix the followers counter being updated instead of the followering counter when (un)following someone
Dismiss last notification on "Mark All As Read" in NotificationFragment
Add support for `MediaSource` v3 and new notification types
Add MAL URL to MediaActivity menu
Don't attempt to bind views in MainActivity
Return specialized date format when using FuzzyDate
Initialize MainActivity's ViewPager / NavigationView in onCreate()
Set android:configChanges for all activities declared in manifest
Sort edges by relationType when grouping them
Replace onList checkbox with tri-state selection dialog
Don't reuse ViewPager adapter during StaffActivity::reloadViewPager()
Add special handling for TBA in groupCharactersByYear()
Open user profile on bottom sheet review avatar click
Share logs as files rather than text
Ignore dismissed notifications across unread notification syncs
Use ExistingWorkPolicy.REPLACE for clear notifications work
Sync local current user data on MainActivity create / resume
Go back to from NotificationActivity to MainActivity if launched directly
Commonize root_preferences.xml and use config variable to control R18 toggle
Hide privacy category if Firebase is not initialized
Nullify all Firebase calls when FirebaseApp is not initialized
README: Replace dead waffle.io link with a link to /issues page
Add bare minimum /user/{animelist,mangalist} deep link support
GroupingUtil: Simplify the way we obtain the entity map list
getAlternativeFormatted: Don't be afraid to return null
getFullName: Discard first name if null
Display anime characters sorted by years on anime roles fragment
Fix profile loading issue and Allow opening the user's list when the overview screen doesn't load
Fix Airing Series Compact card title
Add test to android build workflow
Fix missing quote escape in French string translation
Escape quotes when using HTML inside CDATA strings
Add textMultiLine bit to anime/manga entry input field
Set Start Date on Watching Series
